pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Colour Palettes Based on Famous Artworks from the Rijksmuseum // Create colour palettes based on famous paintings. Using the function rijksPalette(), you can search for any painting in the collection of the Dutch Rijksmuseum and generate a colour palette from it. This package was developed using the fantastic Rijksmuseum API https://www.rijksmuseum.nl/api.
